segments.text: Time flies ! One year has already been a history !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Definitely , it's time to say bye-bye to the last year and to say hello to the new year !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . Have you made any good resolutions for this new year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some resolutions ? That's a wonderful idea , but I have no idea yet . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to be healthier this year , so I think I should take more exercise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will be a good one ! Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I should make a plan about learning my biochemistry , which is a mess !
segments.speaker: S1
